originalText.text: Kind and educated staff help you through the entire process; happy to have been a patient at this clinic! Looking forward to more in the future; thank you to Dr Dellinger for the great bedside manner and thoughtful advice on aftercare and management.

originalText.text: The first and second procedures were outstanding. Doctor Goldstein actually gave me the size I was looking for. Also, the staff were beyond amazing. They are very respectful, and treat you like family.   Hopefully, in the future, I'll definitely return for a 3rd procedure. And, off course I will always recommend to anyone who's looking to get bigger, this is the place you want to be.

originalText.text: I should rate the team a 10 star!… I just had  the best experience with the best staffs Ive ever encountered and they took care of me, made me feel so comfortable, they are very friendly and very helpful. I would like to shout out their names “Sue, Alexandra, Maurelyn, Patti, and ofcourse Dr. Goldsmith who made this possible, and also for Nick” you’re the best! Before I did it, Nick gave all the informations that I needed to know and even after that he’s always guiding me and all the patients. I just would like to express how thankful I am and will be looking forward to seeing them for my next sessions. THANK YOU!!!

originalText.text:
I have nothing but good things to say about this place.
The staff was nice, professional and real from the consultation to the doctor. They made me feel comfortable and cared for.
The results were incredible. I feel amazing, everything looks great and now I set off TSA scanners at the airport.
I wish I knew this existed earlier.
